subject: Re: [junit] Can i send a mail using junit
msgSnippet: Hi Sayali, Yes definitely we can do that. Take the test result passed and send the string as mail using JAVAMAIL API. If you want any more help I can help you
messageBody:
Hi Sayali,
Yes definitely we can do that. Take the test result passed and send the string as mail using JAVAMAIL API.
If you want any more help I can help you in this regard.

Regards
uday bhasker teerdhala
9820669248

sayali_mani <sayali_mani@...> wrote:
Hi,
I want to send a mail saying that the junit test suite has passed or
not .Can i do it .
I know we can use java to do this ,but still need some directions on
this.
Can any1 plz help
Thanks in advance,
Say
